system.description:
Snipers are masters of camouflage and concealment. Any time a Sniper is by himself (or with another Sniper) and has time to conceal himself, he may only be detected on a 1 in 10 chance if someone is actively searching for him (if the searcher is another Sniper, use the Spot Ambush rules instead).

This chance increases by a cumulative +1 for every round the Sniper attacks from that position.
